Posts.Content: May 8, 2011 04:50AM dsnydawn wrote: when I asked my BS about having scans ,she told me they usually don't do them (not sure of reason) but when I went to see my oncologist he sent me for a CT & bone scan ..I did have lumpectomy on 4/13 but need mx which I'm going to NOLA for diep on 5/11 and they required chest xray...sometimes I feel you get a different story from each doctor you ask
Posts.Title: Scans - What did your doc suggest? DebRox annettek
